trends.description: L1 consensus protocols moving toward sub-second finality with enhanced fault tolerance models
evidence: Solana Alpenglow reduces finality from 12s to 100-150ms

trends.description: ZK-based validation replacing execution-based validation at Layer 1 - fundamental scalability paradigm shift
evidence: Six workstreams: consensus specs, prover infrastructure, zkVM APIs
Glamsterdam hard fork mid-2026 for proving windows

trends.description: Encrypted/anonymized mempools at network layer addressing MEV extraction and censorship
evidence: BuilderNet integration for permissionless block building
counterevidence: New attack vectors in anonymity protocols

trends.description: Validator client diversity becoming critical infrastructure requirement
evidence: Solana Firedancer achieving 1M+ TPS in testing

trends.description: Real-time execution layer emerging as next scaling frontier beyond batch rollups
evidence: MegaETH launched Feb 9 2026 with 55K verified TPS
counterevidence: Sustainability of high TPS claims under real load

trends.description: Data availability sampling (DAS) achieving production deployment
Transaction inclusion enforcement mechanisms (FOCIL) targeting proposer-builder separation centralization
evidence: FOCIL (Fork-Choice Enforced Inclusion Lists) proposed for Hegota upgrade

high_delta_findings.title: Ethereum L1-zkEVM Validation Revolution (EIP-8025)
high_delta_findings.description: Fundamental shift from re-execution to proof verification at L1. Six parallel workstreams active. Moves EF strategy away from rollup-centrism back to L1 scaling. Glamsterdam hard fork (mid-2026) critical path for proving windows.

high_delta_findings.title: Flashnet Network-Anonymized Mempools
high_delta_findings.description: Low-latency anonymous broadcast protocol from Flashbots. Network-level anonymity complements FOCIL. Bridges SUAVE vision toward permissionless block building.

high_delta_findings.title: MegaETH Real-Time Streaming EVM Mainnet
high_delta_findings.description: Launched Feb 9, 2026. Verified 55K TPS stress test, targeting 100K. 10ms block times. Modular architecture separating execution from settlement.

high_delta_findings.title: Solana Alpenglow Consensus Protocol
high_delta_findings.description: 80x finality improvement: 12s â†’ 100-150ms. 20%+20% fault tolerance model. Targeting institutional/HFT use cases. Epic: Agave 4.1 Q3 2026.

notable_events.description: Ethereum Protocol restructures into three tracks for scaling/security goals (Blockonomi)

Solana Alpenglow accessible from Agave master branch for private cluster testing
